scripts.db:delete: aws cloudformation delete-stack --stack-name ChinmayaJanata-DynamoDB --region us-east-1 && aws cloudformation wait stack-delete-complete --stack-name ChinmayaJanata-DynamoDB --region us-east-1
scripts.db:status: aws cloudformation describe-stacks --stack-name ChinmayaJanata-DynamoDB --region us-east-1 --query 'Stacks[0].StackStatus' --output text
scripts.db:clean: aws dynamodb delete-table --table-name ChinmayaJanata-Users --region us-east-1 2>/dev/null || true && aws dynamodb delete-table --table-name ChinmayaJanata-Centers --region us-east-1 2>/dev/null || true && aws dynamodb delete-table --table-name ChinmayaJanata-Events --region us-east-1 2>/dev/null || true
